snippet: Luna Rossa of Italy rebounded from damage to its wing sail and a shaky start to overhaul Artemis Racing of Sweden and win the opening race of the America’s Cup challenger semifinals.
abstract: Luna Rossa of Italy rebounds from shaky start to overhaul Artemis Racing of Sweden and win opening race of America’s Cup challenger semifinals.
lead_paragraph: Luna Rossa of Italy rebounded from damage to its wing sail and a shaky start to overhaul Artemis Racing of Sweden and win the opening race of the America’s Cup challenger semifinals.
